A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The 25% of it that was Star Wars was good.  the 75% of it that was Disney not so much.  Horrible plot with massive plot holes\, an excursion that has no bearing on the rest of the story\, characters acting completely differently than they have been established because \"why not\" and this is a long overly drawn out slog fest.  I saw it opening day to avoid spoilers\, but with its constant fan-service this is Netflix quality at best.
